title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Design Activism-Based Architectural Design Skill Project Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic architectural terminology and ability to interpret blueprints

learning_goals: Implementation of 3D modeling applying design technology principles using actual architectural case studies
